alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 4:39PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Arapahoe and central Adams Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 439 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Watkins, or 19 miles east of Denver, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Aurora, southeastern Denver International Airport, Bennett, Watkins, Manila Village, Strasburg and Byers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
